best_quality_text: Our company is committed to upholding the highest standards of quality in all our products and services. These certificates attest to our dedication to quality, safety, and customer satisfaction.
market_experience_text: With years of market presence, our company consistently delivers top-quality products and services. Our long-standing reliability reflects our commitment to excellence, safety, and customer satisfaction.
huge_selection_text: We take pride in offering our customers a diverse selection of products. Our range covers various needs and preferences, allowing you to find the perfect solution for any task and requirement.
we_have_delivery: We offer delivery services throughout Batumi and can deliver our products to any location within the city. Whether you need a single item or a large order, we ensure prompt and reliable delivery.
work_time: Our factory operates daily from 09:00 to 18:00. During working hours, we accept orders and are ready to provide high-quality products on time and efficiently.
cooperate_best: We cooperate with the best companies
empty_cart: Your cart is empty, add something to see your saved items.
info_text: Place an order to find out the cost of products
video_text: Strengthening Structures with Premium Metal Products
order_submitted: The order has been successfully completed
about_company_part1: Welcome to our factory, specializing in the production of metals and metal profiles.
about_company_part2: Founded in 2016, we strive to provide our customers with high-quality products that meet the strictest standards and market requirements.
about_company_part3: Our factory offers a wide range of products, including metal profiles, rebar, sheet metal, and other construction materials. We pride ourselves on meeting the needs of both large construction companies and individual customers, supplying products for various construction and industrial projects.
about_company_part4: We understand that quality is the foundation of our success, which is why all our products undergo rigorous inspection at every stage of production. Modern equipment and technology allow us to guarantee the durability and reliability of our products, making them ideal for use in any conditions.
about_company_part5: Since our inception, our factory has been actively developing, expanding production capacities, and improving technologies. Today, we are one of the leading metal suppliers in the region, and our products are trusted and respected among industry professionals.
about_company_part6: We believe in the power of innovation and are constantly seeking new ways to improve quality and expand our range. Our engineers and specialists are working on developing new solutions to meet the growing needs of our customers and adapt to changing market conditions.
about_company_part7: We value each customer and strive for long-term cooperation. Our team of professionals is always ready to provide qualified assistance in choosing products and answering all your questions. We are confident that together we can achieve great heights in construction and industry.
about_company_part8: Thank you for choosing our factory as a reliable partner. We look forward to working with you and helping you realize your projects at the highest level.
